vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μίσθιος, α, ον,
salaried, hired, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II substantive μίσθιος, ὁ, hired labourer, servant, [LXX+3rd c.BC+] (unless = tenant) [Refs 2nd c.AD+]mercenaries, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
hired workerhireling
hired;, as a substantive, a hired servant, hireling, hired worker Lk. 15:17, 19*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 日計的短工, 受雇的人 (路 15:17,19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 日计的短工, 受雇的人 (路 15:17,19)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: người làm thuê; người làm mướn
